hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.subtitle: Frontend Developer
hero.description: Hi, I'm Abdallah — a frontend developer who turns ideas into immersive, multilingual web experiences.

about.title: Who
about.paragraph1: Welcome to my portfolio. I'm a frontend developer with a passion for crafting thoughtful, user-centered web experiences that combine technical precision with creative design.
about.paragraph2: With years of hands-on experience in modern frontend development, I specialize in React, TypeScript, and Three.js — tools that help me build responsive, interactive applications tailored to real-world needs.
about.paragraph3: Outside of coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies, refining workflows, and staying curious about how digital experiences shape our everyday lives. Let’s build something meaningful together.

projects.title: Stellar
projects.description: Explore my constellation of digital creations, where innovative technology meets cosmic creativity to deliver extraordinary user experiences.

skills.title: Cosmic
skills.description: My technological toolkit spans across multiple galaxies of development, from frontend frameworks to 3D experiences and beyond.

seo.title: Cosmic Developer - Space-Age Portfolio
seo.description: Professional cosmic portfolio showcasing stellar web development skills, interstellar projects, and experience with React, TypeScript, and Three.js across the digital universe
seo.author: Cosmic Developer

contact.title: Mission
contact.description: Ready to launch your next digital adventure? Let's connect and explore the infinite possibilities of the web together.
contact.connectDescription: Whether you have a cosmic vision that needs bringing to life, or you're looking for a stellar developer to join your mission, I'm here to help make it happen.

placeholders.subject: Project Inquiry
placeholders.message: Tell me about your cosmic project...
